content: Yes, Copenhagen's green roofs are indeed impressive, and the city has become a model for sustainable urban development. The success of their green roofs has expanded to other cities and countries as well. The benefits of implementing green roofs and other forms of artificial ecosystems are clear, and many people are recognizing the importance of incorporating these solutions into urban planning to create healthier and more sustainable living spaces. With more and more cities following in Copenhagen's footsteps, we can only hope to see this trend continue to grow and evolve over time.
